org.mini2Dx.core.collision.util

Class QuadTreeAwareCollisionPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Shape
      • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Polygon
        • org.mini2Dx.core.collision.CollisionPolygon
          • org.mini2Dx.core.collision.util.QuadTreeAwareCollisionPolygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollisionArea, CollisionObject, QuadTreeAware, Positionable, PositionChangeListener<CollisionPolygon>, Sizeable, SizeChangeListener<CollisionPolygon>, Interpolatable

    public class QuadTreeAwareCollisionPolygon
extends CollisionPolygon
implements QuadTreeAware
    A CollisionPolygon which implements QuadTreeAware in order to allow QuadTreeSearchDirection.UPWARDS search.

    • Method Detail

      • getQuad

        public QuadTree getQuad()
        Description copied from interface: QuadTreeAware
        Returns the QuadTree where this object is located. You can call this method in order to get the QuadTree on which you can do QuadTreeSearchDirection.UPWARDS search.
        Specified by:
        getQuad in interface QuadTreeAware
        Returns:
        QuadTree where this object is located.

      • setQuad

        public void setQuad(QuadTree quadTree)
        Description copied from interface: QuadTreeAware
        Sets the QuadTree where this object is located. Automatically called by QuadTree.add(T) methods. NOTE: Internal use only.
        Specified by:
        setQuad in interface QuadTreeAware
        Parameters:
        quadTree - The QuadTree where this object is located.
